33 #include "mutation++.h"

35 using std::cout;
36 using std::endl;
37 using std::string;
38 using std::setw;
39 using std::vector;
40 using std::pair;
41 using std::fixed;

43 using namespace Mutation;
44 using namespace Mutation::Thermodynamics;
45 using namespace Mutation::Kinetics;
46 
160 void printMixtureInfo(const Mixture& mixture)
161 {
162  const int ne = mixture.nElements();
163  const int ns = mixture.nSpecies();
164  const int nr = mixture.nReactions();
165  const int ng = mixture.nGas();
166  const int nc = mixture.nCondensed();
167 
168  std::vector<double> h(ns, 0.0);
169  mixture.speciesHOverRT(298.15, &h[0]);
170  for (int i = 0; i < mixture.nSpecies(); ++i)
171  h[i] *= 0.29815*RU;
172 
173  std::ios init(NULL);
174  init.copyfmt(cout);
175 
176  cout << ns << " species containing " << ne << " elements" << endl;
177  cout << nr << " reactions" << endl;
178  cout << endl;
179 
180  int name_width = 0;
181  for (int i = 0; i < ns; ++i)
182  name_width = std::max(name_width, (int) mixture.speciesName(i).size());
183  name_width++;
184 
185  cout << "Species info:" << endl;
186  cout << "-------------" << endl;
187  cout << setw(4) << "#" << " ";
188  cout.setf(std::ios::left, std::ios::adjustfield);
189  cout << setw(name_width) << "Name";
190  cout.setf(std::ios::right, std::ios::adjustfield);
191  for (int i = 0; i < ne; ++i)
192  cout << setw(4) << mixture.elementName(i);
193 
194  cout << setw(12) << "Mw";
195  cout << setw(10) << "Charge";
196  cout << setw(12) << "Phase";
197  cout << setw(12) << "Hf(298)";
198  cout << endl;
199 
200  // Units
201  cout << setw(7) << " "; // Number
202  cout << setw(name_width) << " "; // Name
203  for (int i = 0; i < ne; ++i)
204  cout << setw(4) << " "; // Element name
205  cout << setw(12) << "[g/mol]";
206  cout << setw(10) << " ";
207  cout << setw(12) << " ";
208  cout << setw(12) << "[kJ/mol]";
209  cout << endl;
210 
211 
212  cout << "Gas Species (" << ng << "):" << endl;
213  for (int i = 0; i < ng; ++i) {
214  cout.setf(std::ios::right, std::ios::adjustfield);
215  cout << setw(4) << i+1 << ": ";
216  cout.setf(std::ios::left, std::ios::adjustfield);
217  cout << setw(name_width) << mixture.speciesName(i);
218 
219  cout.setf(std::ios::right, std::ios::adjustfield);
220  for (int j = 0; j < ne; ++j)
221  cout << setw(4) << mixture.elementMatrix()(i,j);
222 
223  cout << setw(12) << mixture.speciesMw(i) * 1000.0
224  << setw(10) << mixture.species()[i].charge();
225 
226  PhaseType phase = mixture.species()[i].phase();
227  cout << setw(12) << (phase == GAS ? "gas" :
228  (phase == LIQUID ? "liquid" : "solid"));
229 
230  cout << fixed << std::setprecision(2) << setw(12) << h[i] << endl;
231  cout.copyfmt(init);
232  }
233 
234  if (nc > 0) {
235  cout << "Condensed Species (" << nc << "):" << endl;
236  for (int i = ng; i < ns; ++i) {
237  cout.setf(std::ios::right, std::ios::adjustfield);
238  cout << setw(4) << i+1 << ": ";
239  cout.setf(std::ios::left, std::ios::adjustfield);
240  cout << setw(name_width) << mixture.speciesName(i);
241 
242  cout.setf(std::ios::right, std::ios::adjustfield);
243  for (int j = 0; j < ne; ++j)
244  cout << setw(4) << mixture.elementMatrix()(i,j);
245 
246  cout << setw(12) << mixture.speciesMw(i) * 1000.0
247  << setw(10) << mixture.species()[i].charge();
248 
249  PhaseType phase = mixture.species()[i].phase();
250  cout << setw(12) << (phase == GAS ? "gas" :
251  (phase == LIQUID ? "liquid" : "solid"));
252 
253  cout << fixed << std::setprecision(2) << setw(12) << h[i] << endl;
254  cout.copyfmt(init);
255  }
256  }
257 
258  cout << endl;
259 
260  cout << "Default elemental composition:" << endl;
261  cout << "------------------------------" << endl;
262  for (int i = 0; i < ne; ++i) {
263  cout.setf(std::ios::left, std::ios::adjustfield);
264  cout << " " << setw(3) << mixture.elementName(i) << ": ";
265  cout.setf(std::ios::right, std::ios::adjustfield);
266  cout << setw(5) << mixture.getDefaultComposition(i) << endl;
267  }
268 
269  cout << endl;
270 
271  if (nr == 0) return;
272 
273  cout << "Reaction info:" << endl;
274  cout << "--------------" << endl;
275 
276  // Make a key for the reaction type
277  std::set<ReactionType> types;
278  for (int i = 0; i < nr; ++i)
279  types.insert(mixture.reactions()[i].type());
280 
281  cout << "Type ID Key" << endl;
282  std::set<ReactionType>::const_iterator iter = types.begin();
283  for ( ; iter != types.end(); ++iter)
284  cout << setw(4) << *iter << ": " << reactionTypeString(*iter) << endl;
285 
286  // Reaction table header
287  int formula_width = 7; // at least as big as "Formula"
288  for (int i = 0; i < nr; ++i) {
289  const Reaction& reaction = mixture.reactions()[i];
290  formula_width = std::max(formula_width, (int)reaction.formula().size());
291  }
292  formula_width += 2;
293 
294  cout << endl;
295  cout << "Reactions" << endl;
296  cout << setw(4) << "#" << ": ";
297  cout.setf(std::ios::left, std::ios::adjustfield);
298  cout << setw(formula_width) << "Formula";
299  cout << setw(6) << "Type";
300  cout << setw(12) << "Rate Law";
301  cout.setf(std::ios::right, std::ios::adjustfield);
302  cout << setw(12) << "A (m,s,mol)";
303  cout << setw(7) << "n";
304  cout << setw(10) << "Ta (K)" << endl;
305  for (int i = 0; i < nr; ++i) {
306  const Reaction& r = mixture.reactions()[i];
307 
308  // Print reaction formula and number
309  cout.setf(std::ios::right, std::ios::adjustfield);
310  cout << setw(4) << i+1 << ": ";
311  cout.setf(std::ios::left, std::ios::adjustfield);
312  cout << setw(formula_width) << r.formula();
313  cout << setw(6) << r.type();
314 
315  // Print out rate constants
316  if (dynamic_cast<const Arrhenius*>(r.rateLaw()) != NULL) {
317  const Arrhenius& rate =
318  dynamic_cast<const Arrhenius&>(*(r.rateLaw()));
319  cout << setw(12) << "Arrhenius: ";
320 
321  cout.setf(std::ios::right, std::ios::adjustfield);
322  cout.setf(std::ios::scientific, std::ios::floatfield);
323  cout.precision(3);
324  cout << setw(12) << rate.A();
325  cout.setf(std::ios::fixed, std::ios::floatfield);
326  cout.precision(2);
327  cout << setw(7) << rate.n();
328  cout.precision(1);
329  cout << setw(10) << rate.T();
330  }
331 
332  cout << endl;
333 
334  // If this is a thirdbody reaction, print out thirdbody efficiency
335  // factors
336  if (r.isThirdbody() && r.efficiencies().size() > 0) {
337 
338  vector<pair<int, double> >::const_iterator iter =
339  r.efficiencies().begin();
340 
341  cout.precision(2);
342  cout << setw(6) << "" << mixture.speciesName(iter->first) << ": "
343  << iter->second;
344 
345  for (iter++; iter != r.efficiencies().end(); ++iter) {
346  cout << ", " << mixture.speciesName(iter->first) << ": "
347  << iter->second;
348  }
349 
350  cout << endl;
351  }
352  }
353 
354  cout << endl;
355 }
356 
360 int main(int argc, char** argv)
361 {
362  MixtureOptions opts;
363 
364  if (argc < 2 || argc > 3) {
365  cout << "- checkmix mixture-name" << endl;
366  cout << " or " << endl;
367  cout << "- checkmix database(NASA-7, NASA-9, RRHO) species-descriptor" << endl;
368  exit(1);
369  } else if (argc == 2) {
370  opts.loadFromFile(argv[1]);
371  } else {
372  opts.setThermodynamicDatabase(argv[1]);
373  opts.setSpeciesDescriptor(argv[2]);
374  }
375 
376  cout << "location: " << opts.getSource() << endl;
377 
378  try {
379  printMixtureInfo(opts);
380  std::cout << "checkmix succeeded." << std::endl;
381  } catch (Error& e) {
382  std::cout << e.what() << std::endl;
383  std::cout << "checkmix failed." << std::endl;
384  }
385 }
